exterior.title: Landscaping and Garden Enhancement
exterior.description: Enhance the curb appeal by updating the landscaping. This includes adding new plants, flowers, and shrubs, as well as installing a small water feature or garden lighting. This will make the property more attractive and inviting.

exterior.title: Deck and Patio Upgrade
exterior.description: Upgrade the existing deck and patio area with new materials and design. Consider adding a pergola or outdoor kitchen area to increase functionality and appeal. This will enhance the outdoor living space, making it more desirable for potential buyers.

exterior.title: Exterior Painting and Siding Refresh
exterior.description: Repaint the exterior of the house and refresh the siding to give it a modern and clean look. This simple update can significantly improve the overall appearance of the property.

exterior.title: Driveway and Walkway Resurfacing
exterior.description: Resurface the driveway and walkway to improve the property's entrance. Consider using decorative concrete or pavers for a more upscale look. This will enhance the first impression of the home.

exterior.title: Front Door and Porch Update
exterior.description: Update the front door and porch area with new paint, hardware, and lighting. This will create a welcoming entrance and improve the home's curb appeal.

living area.title: Open Concept Living Area
living area.description: Remove non-load-bearing walls to create an open concept living and dining area. This will enhance the flow of the space and make it more appealing to potential buyers.

living area.title: Update Lighting Fixtures
living area.description: Replace outdated lighting fixtures with modern, energy-efficient options. This will brighten the space and add a contemporary touch.

living area.title: Refinish Hardwood Floors
living area.description: Sand and refinish the existing hardwood floors to restore their original luster. This will enhance the overall appearance of the living area.

living area.title: Accent Wall with Modern Paint
living area.description: Add a fresh coat of paint to create an accent wall in the living area. Choose a modern color that complements the existing decor.

living area.title: Install Energy-Efficient Windows
living area.description: Replace old windows with new energy-efficient models. This will improve insulation, reduce energy costs, and increase the property's value.

kitchen.title: Upgrade to Quartz Countertops
kitchen.description: Replace existing countertops with quartz for a modern and durable finish. Quartz is highly desirable for its aesthetic appeal and low maintenance.

kitchen.title: Install Under-Cabinet Lighting
kitchen.description: Add LED under-cabinet lighting to enhance the kitchen's ambiance and functionality. This is a cost-effective way to modernize the space.

kitchen.title: Upgrade Appliances to Energy-Efficient Models
kitchen.description: Replace old appliances with new energy-efficient models. This not only improves the kitchen's look but also reduces energy costs, appealing to eco-conscious buyers.

kitchen.title: Add a Backsplash
kitchen.description: Install a stylish backsplash to add character and protect the walls. Choose a neutral design to appeal to a wide range of buyers.

kitchen.title: Replace Cabinet Hardware
kitchen.description: Update the cabinet handles and knobs to a more modern style. This is a simple and affordable way to refresh the kitchen's appearance.

bath.title: Upgrade to Modern Fixtures
bath.description: Replace outdated faucets, showerheads, and lighting fixtures with modern, water-efficient models. This will enhance the bathroom's aesthetic appeal and improve energy efficiency.

bath.title: Install Heated Flooring
bath.description: Add electric heated flooring to provide comfort during cold months. This feature is highly attractive to buyers in colder climates and adds a touch of luxury.

bath.title: Repaint and Refresh
bath.description: Apply a fresh coat of paint in neutral tones to make the space feel larger and more inviting. Update any worn-out cabinetry with a new finish or paint.

bath.title: Add a Double Vanity
bath.description: Install a double vanity to increase functionality and appeal to families or couples. This addition maximizes space and provides extra storage.

bath.title: Upgrade Shower Enclosure
bath.description: Replace the existing shower enclosure with a frameless glass design. This modernizes the bathroom and creates a more open and luxurious feel.

other.title: Interior Painting
other.description: Repaint the walls in a modern, neutral color to enhance the appeal and brightness of the space. This can make the home feel fresh and updated, appealing to potential buyers.

other.title: Lighting Upgrade
other.description: Install modern, energy-efficient lighting fixtures in the hallway and rooms. This can improve the ambiance and energy efficiency of the home, making it more attractive to buyers.

other.title: Floor Refinishing
other.description: Refinish the hardwood floors to restore their original shine and beauty. This can significantly enhance the aesthetic appeal of the home.

other.title: Window Treatments
other.description: Add or update window treatments to improve privacy and style. This can also help with energy efficiency and add a touch of elegance to the rooms.

other.title: Bathroom Modernization
other.description: Update the bathroom with new fixtures, tiles, and a fresh coat of paint. This can greatly increase the home's value and appeal to potential buyers.

bedroom.title: Upgrade to Hardwood Flooring
bedroom.description: Replace existing flooring with high-quality hardwood to enhance the aesthetic appeal and increase property value.

bedroom.title: Paint and Refresh Walls
bedroom.description: Repaint the walls with modern, neutral colors to make the space feel fresh and inviting.

bedroom.title: Add Built-in Wardrobes
bedroom.description: Install built-in wardrobes to maximize storage space and improve room functionality.

bedroom.title: Upgrade Lighting Fixtures
bedroom.description: Replace outdated lighting fixtures with modern, energy-efficient options to enhance ambiance and reduce energy costs.

bedroom.title: Install Crown Molding
bedroom.description: Add crown molding to the ceilings to give the rooms a more finished and elegant look.
